hero.title: Personalized Learning
hero.subtitle: AI generates content from your vocabulary, adapts to your interests, and creates practice tailored to how you learn. Not generic study materials—a learning path built for you.

exams.title: Learn for what matters to you
exams.subtitle: Whether you're preparing for exams, traveling, or exploring media—we've got you covered.

comparison.title: Not another flashcard app
comparison.subtitle: Most apps test what you recognize. We test what you can produce.

us.item3: Adapts to your goals and learning style

loop.title: The complete learning loop
loop.subtitle: Input, practice, output, repeat. Every feature connects to help you actually learn.

input.title: Input
input.description: Read stories, listen to audio, watch videos—all at your level

capture.title: Capture
capture.description: Save words automatically or manually. Build your personal vocabulary.

review.title: Review
review.description: AI-generated flashcards with example sentences, refreshed to stay relevant

output.title: Output
output.description: Write sentences, get instant AI feedback on grammar and usage

features.title: Everything you need to reach your goals
features.subtitle: From vocabulary building to personalized practice, we've got you covered.

flashcards.title: AI-Powered Flashcards
flashcards.description: Cards auto-generated with example sentences at your level. Sentences refresh periodically so you don't just memorize patterns.

writing.title: Writing Practice
writing.description: Create sentences using target words. AI checks grammar, word usage, and naturalness—then shows you how to improve.

personalized.title: Personalized Content
personalized.description: Stories and exercises generated from YOUR vocabulary and interests. Practice exactly what you want to learn.

exams.title: Exam Prep
exams.description: Mock tests that match JLPT, TOEFL, DELF, and other official exam structures and scoring.

audio.title: Native Audio
audio.description: Listen to stories and flashcards with natural pronunciation. Train your ears while you learn.

tapDefine.title: Tap-to-Define
tapDefine.description: Tap any word for instant definitions. Reading aids like furigana help you stay in flow.

progress.title: Progress Analytics
progress.description: Track your learning journey with detailed stats and personalized insights.

community.title: Community Stories
community.description: Learn from content created by native speakers and fellow learners.

cta.title: Start learning smarter
cta.subtitle: Join learners who are reaching their language goals with AI-powered, personalized study materials.

footer.tagline: {{brandName}} - Personalized language learning powered by AI
